part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of raw meat.~J211

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is tough but the meal is filling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A solid wall.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Anarchy is wound into stasis by time's virtual antipode and packaged into a metal disc. Only the instruction of movement will direct it to unaccrete.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small sphere.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shadowing segments arrange along the ley lines of this plane to form a geometric mesh. Objects on orthogonal trajectories are netted and shunted back toward their planar homes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The forces of slaughter have rearranged parts of the body. You ponder how rearrangement means something different in each of its contexts: pieces on a game board, favored courtiers in a king's hall, and parts on a body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fire has poached the light from this body. Its stillness writhes against the changing soil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The forces of slaughter have rearranged parts of the body. You ponder how rearrangement means something different in each of its contexts: pieces on a game board, favored courtiers in a king's hall, and parts on a body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Who's preserved the skins and innards of this still one? Was it the dry air of Moghra'yi? Or the doting persistence of human ritual? Does it matter?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The blood is still wet. Never had you regarded wetness as a sort of clock, until now.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here lies a humanoid who'd have never guessed their torso would shelter dust from the gills of tiny mushrooms, but should have.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plumes of noxious gas stick to the air. They crowd the lungs of wet-blooded creatures who can't extract the displaced oxygen.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bits of dead matter are aerosolized into a thick coal fog. Light is lost inside.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hot aerosol swells as it starts to dissipate into air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: As clouds descend on a warm valley, so does escaped cryo vapor on its surroundings. Objects come through the translucent mist in waves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: As clouds descend on a warm valley, so does escaped cryo vapor on its surroundings. Objects come through the translucent mist in waves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Even now the nimbus of vaporized acid is condensing, starting to settle on its colonized surfaces, starting to sink through their soft edges.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The nickel-dew sticks to the air and arrests the transient molecules of migrant-matter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Miasma settles the lungs of its neighbors and guides them to the dreaming dale. Their bodies repose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cobalt gas seeps into the nose and disarranges the mind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gas molecules arrange along the ley lines of this plane to form an aeriform mesh. Objects on orthogonal trajectories are netted and shunted back toward their planar homes.

tag.Name: LevelEffectDescription
tag.Value: astral tethering and damage versus extradimensional beings

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The synthetic mist called Golden Dawn ascends from its canister to atomize leafage and leave a clear view of the horizon in its wake.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Magenta showers the heterotrophs in a wet film that inhibits their absorption of dead animal and plant-things.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Minuscule hexagons of crushed glass, insect parts, and polyester film twinkle in the air like the ionized helium of star dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A heavy, translucent egg-shaped device.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A palm sized disk of jet black plastic, covered in strange runes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Every autumn, many gulch dwellers hike to the Stiltgrounds to purchase the Fall wine. They return to their homes, steep wheat bran in the wine, and leaven dough in their clay ovens. A few are luckier; fungus grove dwellers need only step outside to harvest yeast, and friends to fungi need only shake their yeast-ridden appendages.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cheesecloth sticks to the greasy faces of this pig cheese cuboid. For two years tiny organisms have accumulated on its surfaces, ripening it to tasty perfection.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Leafy malachites and pistachios are bound by twine. Every third day or so, a leaf tics and twinges, as it still adjusts to the untoxic air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spongy foodstuff molded into a slate-hued cube of perfect proportions. What forces married the messiness of eating with the precision of cubes?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The truffle is encrusted with a wine-colored char residue born of gases unknown to the world's surfaces. Deep, deep in the earth and across the Pale Sea was it smoldered to succulence.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Seasoning the minced meat that's trapped under the crust is a smidge of yyffur dust, shaved from the stalk of the eponymous mushroom and finely ground. The whole mushroom is much too powerful for a mammalian psyche (consuming one would obliterate the ego in mere moments), but a smidge of dust on a tasty pie can remind one of one's place in the cosmos.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: -1 Ego permanently

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes bitter. Your {{Y|Ego}} is reduced by {{C|1}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small, normal looking bush. It's hard to pay attention to such a mundane specimen.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large prickly looking fellow, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:loom:afterpronoun= with the threat of physical violence, or even a hug.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A svelte, candid seeming chap. You realize that the flower is a sex organ, and that gets you thinking.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A gnarly mass of heaving tentacles, looks like something a fisherman's wife would enjoy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stout being whose bark is worse than =pronouns.possessive= bite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small pile of quivering hyphae, the fungus seems quite content.

xtagTextFragments.Activity: basking in the shade
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Images of distant places and times past, present, and future shimmer in the space before you. Strange sounds whose makers inhabit those innumerable vistas stretch through your ears, echoes of an astral continuum.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Set in the middle of the great white head of this ape are two red eyes that gleam with a savage intellect. Snowy white fur covers the ape's hulking frame. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:lift:afterpronoun= an enormous fist and =verb:beat:afterpronoun= =pronouns.possessive= chest in fury as you approach.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The snow white pelt of an albino ape, prized for its beauty and capacity to provide warmth.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's tough and tastes of old rust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hulking, alabaster ape corpse.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: From atop =pronouns.possessive= sunning boulder, this small monkey =verb:peer= at you with eyes full of curiosity. Two puffs of grey fur billow out from either side of =pronouns.possessive= face.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This bear hums a tune to =pronouns.reflexive= as =pronouns.subjective= forages for berries and honey, offering laconic greetings to everything =pronouns.subjective= passes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Though =pronouns.possessive= ursine kinsfolk oppose gravity and chase prey up the splayed branches of trees, the barkbiter knows what natural philosophers know: with some beseeching, the tree and its occupants will descend of their own accord.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat tastes of ageless sawdust.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large, rotting mound of flesh.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bloody, stinking hunk of barkbiter flesh.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It sheaths itself in filmy wings.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It made for a grisly meal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A huge mound of rotting flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bloody, stinking hunk of bear flesh.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes awful, but it meets the bare necessities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Orbicular beetle that roams and ingests.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It has an acidic taste and crispy texture.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plump wedges of beetle meat encased in a cracked, bulbous shell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A squat, snouted mammal in pink flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This ill-tempered, bristled pig struts about on stubby legs.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is tough but the meal is filling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bloated lump of boar remains.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of rotting boar meat.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The meat is tough but the meal is filling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stinking lump of pig remains.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of fresh pig meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slavering muzzles snap at each other as it ambles around in choleric hunger.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stout human's bare skin is pallid from years of abstaining from sunlight. =pronouns.Possessive= eyes are glazed and bestial; isolation has rendered =pronouns.objective= more of a beast than =article==pronouns.personTerm=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A man beyond the pathogen: muscles bulging in grotesque asymmetry, skin both gnashed and scaled, teeth filed into fangs, quivering pupils dilated to the size of coins, and sclera raw with tributaries of blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spindle-limbed, brown, and skittish, it spins a home anxiously.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
The fine glass-like fibers of this compact feline's coat collect and bend the light of far stars into strange, semiophorous loops.
&mphosphorescent&y

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The taut muscles of this wild cat are sheathed in interlocking, maize plates of chitin.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Though difficult to dissect, the meat that adheres to the armored plates is delicious.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thatched together out of scrap metal, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:teeter:afterpronoun=. What was the artist and maker thinking while banging metal into a likeness? =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:occupy:afterpronoun= a point between poles on several axes: halfway between chimp and human, halfway between child and adult. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= small, and there are shadows under =pronouns.possessive= chrome cheek.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shem has augmented =pronouns.possessive= body beyond the chromeling's basic form by welding on a dissymmetric ruffled coat of scrap metal. It's too big and grandiose for =pronouns.possessive= little figure, but Shem shuffles about confidently, as if =pronouns.subjective= expect to grow into it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thatched together out of scrap metal, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:teeter:afterpronoun=. What was the artist and maker thinking while banging metal into a likeness? =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:occupy:afterpronoun= a point between poles on several axes: halfway between chimp and human, halfway between child and adult. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= small, and there are shadows under =pronouns.possessive= chrome cheek.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: With a shell no larger than a human fist, this crab scuttles through a vent curiously suited to the dimensions of =pronouns.possessive= figure. Often accompanied by dozens of =pronouns.possessive= ghastly cousins, the jittering decapod means to devour all living matter =pronouns.subjective= =verb:pass:afterpronoun= over.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The head and torso of the cloneling are comprised of skull-sized, hexagonal pyramids of polished chrome. Four many-jointed chrome rods swivel from =pronouns.possessive= core, wielding rusty scalpels, and another hangs limply: the cloneling's genetic nanoprinter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ideas like the tetravalence of carbon and silicon were suffocated in the thick valley air of jungle hamlets. The human gatherer who mounts a root-braided hillock and looks out to the horizon in wonder, who descries flecks of granite stirring on the mountain face, and who with ancestral dread ponders what toll the rocks themselves are animated to collect, he can't know the miracles of chemistry that sophists inscribed in data disks at the Long Before. Those miracles are to him the ciphers of god-things.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= hoary, cracked scales look like marked stone.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's hard to chew and takes a while to consume, but it fills you up.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of croc meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Limbs like fur-dressed spindles spring =pronouns.possessive= slender frame across the brachiated world. One eye breaks the plane of =pronouns.possessive= furless face. A lack of depth perception would inhibit =pronouns.possessive= throwing efficacy were =pronouns.subjective= not able to triangulate =pronouns.possessive= viewing plane with =pronouns.possessive= duplicates.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A snarling mess of matted hair.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This snarling, spotted dog trots back and forth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large, beige mastiff sits perched on stiff front legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: That's a dead dog.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stoic, long-necked mancamel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This crumpled corpse of a mancamel stinks of spice.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stoic, long-necked mancamel, this trader belongs to the race of mercantile desert-rovers who men call Dromad.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An arch of electricity writhes between the two feelers of this shoulder-height snail. =pronouns.Possessive= muscular foot disappears beneath a striated, brownish shell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shockingly scrumptious.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Trudging along at a snail's pace is a bear-sized shell splendiferously adorned by nature. Roiling citrine, frozen azure, and polished jade spiral inwards and out in perfect mathematical harmony.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Like your mother baked it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The slimy shell of a hatched snail egg.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slimy egg covered in tiny, hairline cracks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pulpous, plum-colored slug races across the floor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The tiny hairs of this dog-sized spider stick straight up and crackle with electrical energy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny hairs stick straight up from the charged, crumpled corpse of this spider.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This feathered serpent =verb:glide= upon great, leathery wings. The air about =pronouns.possessive= colorful plumage shimmers with heat, and =pronouns.subjective= =verb:leave:afterpronoun= in =pronouns.possessive= wake a blazing trail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Feathers of every color flit about the warm, curled corpse of this winged reptile.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Char coats the prismatic scales of a coiled ring of meat. It smells like an open flame.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The chrome from which this six-legged robot was wrought is tarnished. Where one might expect the head of a beast to rest upon =pronouns.possessive= torso, there is only a smooth semisphere. At the extremity of each of =pronouns.possessive= cyclindrical arms is a conical drill whose spinning produces an ear-splitting whine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The musculature of this strapping, tranquil beast is so pronounced that =pronouns.subjective= =verb:look:afterpronoun= as though the muscles themselves might burst through =pronouns.possessive= rich, auburn coat. Great tufts of white hair surround =pronouns.possessive= massive hooves, which =pronouns.subjective= =verb:rear:afterpronoun= every so often while =pronouns.subjective= =verb:graze:afterpronoun=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This strapping beast's body lies in regal repose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This squat, ivory crab has evolved a heightened sense of hearing in order to perceive =pronouns.possessive= surroundings in the lightless nooks =pronouns.subjective= =verb:inhabit:afterpronoun=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The pearly, convex carapace of an eyeless crab.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The cracked, lifeless shell of an eyeless crab.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Delicious, meaty crab legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This enormous crab scuttles forth beneath a cavernous ivory shell large enough to house a man and a bedroll, and in fact Qud's subterranean hermits are known to take up residence in the flaking shells of dead king crabs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The enormous, lifeless shell of a deceased king crab.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Enormous, meaty crab legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A giant ant whose antennae writhe about furiously. Plumes of noxious gas rise out of dozens of tiny pores scattered across =pronouns.possessive= carapace.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A giant ant whose antennae writhe about furiously. Plumes of fragrant smoke rise out of dozens of tiny pores scattered across =pronouns.possessive= carapace.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Much like the children of =pronouns.possessive= colony, the queen fire ant's onyx carapace fumes with pungent smoke. However, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:are:afterpronoun= much larger than the other fire ants, and on =pronouns.possessive= back =pronouns.subjective= =verb:bear:afterpronoun= a pair of filmy wings with which =pronouns.subjective= =verb:conduct:afterpronoun= =pronouns.possessive= nuptial flights.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A smoldering, upturned ant corpse.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A halo of smoke surrounds an orb of calefaction.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The skin about this squat pig's snout is blackened from the heat of =pronouns.possessive= nasal blazes. A single plume of smoke curls upward out of =pronouns.possessive= nostrils.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The blackened corpse of this pig slowly roasts itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stout, thickly-muscled herbivore is intensely territorial, violently attacking anything that crosses =pronouns.possessive= path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spindle glitter rained from heaven and sowed the holoptic valley of the adiyy's eye. It sprouted gluttonous molecules that sucked the hue from the bug's head, chest, and wings. It unrendered the adiyy, and left it to flit from leaf to leaf, half-blind and dirgeful.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Humors are the eroded bits of the earth: dust flaked off a million-year-old wall of shale, runoff brine dripped through a hairline crack of chrome, dew clung to the lips of a pipe after it's belched its septic vapor. Under the right conditions, at time scales inscrutable to kith and kin, the bits are heaped together by the geometry of entropy and remorphed into the prime material anew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Humors are the eroded bits of the earth: dust flaked off a million-year-old wall of shale, runoff brine dripped through a hairline crack of chrome, dew clung to the lips of a pipe after it's belched its septic vapor. Under the right conditions, at time scales inscrutable to kith and kin, the bits are heaped together by the geometry of entropy and remorphed into the prime material anew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Humors are the eroded bits of the earth: dust flaked off a million-year-old wall of shale, runoff brine dripped through a hairline crack of chrome, dew clung to the lips of a pipe after it's belched its septic vapor. Under the right conditions, at time scales inscrutable to kith and kin, the bits are heaped together by the geometry of entropy and remorphed into the prime material anew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mass of quivering, gelatinous slime. You barely perceive the outline of something inside.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a huge mass of stinking slime, slowly leaking its vital jelly into the floor below.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A goat-sized beetle with a striated, onyx shell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sticky mess of beetle flesh.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: The taste is bitter and salty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simulacrum of a goat-sized beetle with a striated, onyx shell.

part.Name: Roboticized
part.DescriptionPostfix: There is sharp, persistent ticking emanating outward.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A python-sized arthropod undulates forward on hundreds of chittering legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Big diaphanous wings bat the air as it drones in place.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bristling with coarse, odious stalks of Girsh hair is the thorax of this gigantic fly. =pronouns.Possessive= thousand eyes reflect your image in the color of rust, and from within =pronouns.possessive= mouth an eerie, jaundiced light glows.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A truly grotesque creature, the agolzvuv appears to be a massive and un-naturally twisted fly. The enormous forelimb barbs of this flightless terror are hung with bits of flesh from =pronouns.possessive= previous victims, slowly rotting for later consumption.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black ooze drips from =pronouns.possessive= fangs to =pronouns.possessive= pallid leg-things. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:shudder:afterpronoun= in primordial ecstasy and =verb:let:afterpronoun= out a shrill whine that pierces your skull.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pallid leg-things twitch with zoetic insistence.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Like biting into a pear made of gristle and gel.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It continues to wriggle after it's chewed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The roiling, flailing husk of some sort of Qud worm. =pronouns.Possessive= body and mind have been twisted by the dark energies of the deep caves of Qud.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lucent skin blooms beneath matted feathers. =pronouns.Possessive= tiny beak is hooked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The smoldering remains of a dead crow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Luminescent flecks flit beneath the water's surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dimmed motes dot the scales.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A constant rain of gorgeous sparkling dust drifts down from the glowmoth's wings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The glowmoth corpse gives off a lovely radiant heat as it slowly decays.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A disc of leaf with luminous veins.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The curled, tough corpse of a glowpad is indistinguishable from a giant brussel-sprout.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This glowpad seems to be... running a small shop?

part.Name: SecretObjectTalk
part.message: You now know the location of an &Coddly-hued &Yglowpad merchant.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Beneath the umbra of a stinking robe, flesh smears over the bones of =article==pronouns.immaturePersonTerm= who =verb:surrender= =pronouns.possessive= body to the metamorphic numen.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This tonsured albino has ceremoniously pierced the flesh of =pronouns.possessive= neck with hundreds of urchin spines. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:chant:afterpronoun= the hymn of the hoary demon Bethsaida as =pronouns.subjective= performs a mixing rite, pouring a vial of blood into a vial of luminous water.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:chew:afterpronoun= cud without a care for the mess in =pronouns.possessive= tangled beard.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: A gamey meal of raw goat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bloated corpse of a goat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of mild smelling goat meat.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Would taste great salted, or smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A braid of roasted frogskin stretches taut over =pronouns.possessive= swollen pectorals and fastens a satchel to =pronouns.possessive= hip. =pronouns.Possessive= hooves are stained with Naphtaali blood. Spittle flies from =pronouns.possessive= bleating mouth into a tuft of hair beneath =pronouns.possessive= chin.

xtagTextFragments.Activity: gorging on the flesh of beasts by starlight

part.Name: Food
part.Message: A gamey meal of raw goatfolk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The stinking corpse of a mangoat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The skin was flayed from the body of this goatfolk leaving behind a crumpled frame of tendons and muscles rotting in putrid, black blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fire burned the flesh and charred the bone of this mangoat. All that remains is a blackened skeletal frame covered in molten, glutinous tissue and crumpled on the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small, warm seed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mamon =verb:stand= nearly a head taller than =pronouns.possessive= kin and broader at the shoulders. Great tufts of blood-matted hair, some of which is braided, tassel out from =pronouns.possessive= head and chin, and a tattered, crimson headdress hangs from one of =pronouns.possessive= colossal horns. In long swaths on =pronouns.possessive= bare chest the fur is scorched and the skin flayed. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:wear:afterpronoun= a sarong wrapped about =pronouns.possessive= waist, its wool fibers sodden with a foul, inky liquid. =pronouns.Possessive= face is a vision of madness, at once the countenance of a rapturous crone and a child in fright.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The patchwork of ash and dirt-caked hides make a gradient of flesh across the hermit's body. =pronouns.Possessive= hair has knotted into a rat's nest. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:scream:afterpronoun= in a tongue of =pronouns.possessive= own invention.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny skin crystals shift and sort, changing the color of =pronouns.possessive= appearance. A narrow bone extrudes from =pronouns.possessive= head.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It tastes a bit like kiwi fruit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thick cord of bristly segments are capped by a cuspate beak for breaking through shale.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of mild smelling worm meat.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Would taste great salted, or smoked.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The young knollworm secretes an epoxy-like resin that hardens into plates when compressed by shale.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The distended jaw of this large aureolin fish is lined with wicked, blade-like teeth. You shudder to imagine what sort of terrible amphibious fiend the madpole might one day become.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a little cartilaginous, but tasty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This awful, chimeric beast is known to take any number of forms to fool =pronouns.possessive= prey, though no one knows whether =pronouns.subjective= truly =verb:assume:afterpronoun= those forms or merely =verb:trick:afterpronoun= the minds of =pronouns.possessive= quarries into believing it so.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A droid who shares the stature and girth of a short, rotund man. =pronouns.Possessive= hull is covered in verdigris, and for limbs =pronouns.subjective= =verb:bear:afterpronoun= a broad shovel and a hacksaw.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A droid who shares the stature and girth of a short, rotund man. =pronouns.Possessive= hull is covered in verdigris, and for limbs =pronouns.subjective= =verb:bear:afterpronoun= a broad shovel and a hacksaw. &C----- &yReprogrammed by &Cthe Mechanimists

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= deepest encoding is the following moral imperative: 'extinguish spatial and temporal anomalies, be they the result of happenstance, maleficence, or planar kismet.'

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hermetic cask, hose, and nozzle. Inscribed are the words: 'in case of dimensional emergency, spray'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:gulp:afterpronoun= and =verb:shiver:afterpronoun= tufts off =pronouns.possessive= rime-tarped nostrils.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A soft mash of gooey, stinking flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long lathe of time shaved the prospects from beneath a reptile's feet until =pronouns.subjective= hid in a shell of plastron and carapace, brooding and peevish.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A massive, cracked tortoise shell, filled with delicious turtle meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its swollen tubers hum.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The starchy tuber of a dreadroot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its aspect imbued with lucent coral, this mushroom catches your eye like no other. Qud knows no such hue, and so you ask =player.reflexive=: what sort of radiant rain dyed its flesh? Could it be an iota of the Eaters themselves, mummified in the soil of the Rainbow Wood?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Your eyes lose focus in the spongent craters of a coral moon. Is this the flesh of gods?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The remains of a human adult.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Poking out of a pool of coral resin are the unbleached bones of a human adult. Its remains have seeded a grove of otherworldly shrooms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Poking out of a copse of brinestalk are the unbleached bones of a human adult.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= leafy lobes flush and dampen with liquid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Standing taller than a snapjaw and three times as wide, the blossom of the feral lah resembles a bundle of freshly severed saltback tongues. Its bouquet can only be described as 'sweaty animal', and its flabby leaves stand poised and ready to bludgeon anyone who dares to get close. Several thorny rhizome pods pulse near its base like a clutch of eager children.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Racing across the ground at alarming speed, the brittle rhizome pod digs into the dirt with its thorns as it seeks meaty vessels to explosively gift with its genetic material.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Auric gills tense and release, tense and release, tense and release, as if drawing breath into the puffer's stem. With each exhalation it belches a cloud of golden spores like motes of sunlight. They flutter back to the cap and congeal into a golden plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Azure gills tense and release, tense and release, tense and release, as if drawing breath into the puffer's stem. With each exhalation it belches a cloud of indigo spores like motes of twilight. They flutter back to the cap and congeal into an azure plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rose gills tense and release, tense and release, tense and release, as if drawing breath into the puffer's stem. With each exhalation it belches a cloud of indigo spores like motes of twilight. They flutter back to the cap and congeal into an rose plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Jade gills tense and release, tense and release, tense and release, as if drawing breath into the puffer's stem. With each exhalation it belches a cloud of indigo spores like motes of twilight. They flutter back to the cap and congeal into a jade plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a luminous toadstool coated in hoarfrost.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a luminous toadstool coated in hoarfrost.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 180-220 rounds You cast light in radius 2. For the first 5 rounds after imbibing, you gain 0.6 hit points per level (minimum 3) each round. +20 cold resistance You cannot be poisoned.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Matted fronds sway in the air currents and speckle the ground with flakes of moisture-sucked rust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a crunchy and red stalk of celery.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Verdurous cirri mottled with thorns reach for the warmth of a body. They hug the air in desperation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's the rare and beautiful blossom of a jilted lover vine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: From the great, sloping forehead of this man-ape sprouts no hair, though rich black fur courses over the rest of =pronouns.possessive= body. Broad knuckles bear the brunt of =pronouns.possessive= weight as the beast =verb:saunter= forth in search of something to clobber.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The filthy pelt of an ogre ape.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Tough, and tastes of old rust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's the stinking corpse of an ogre ape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bulbous snag of a plant, unshy about sharing =pronouns.possessive= spines.

xtagTextFragments.Activity: undulating serenely
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: bathing in our stews,undulating near our stews
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: having neither arms nor legs nor a head

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stygian spongeball is stuck to the floor and dappled with dream dew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stygian spongeball is stuck to the floor and dappled with disorienting dew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= shell is the color of air-sucked iron. =pronouns.Subjective= waves a monstrous claw in hostility, and blood-crusted rust flakes are shaken free of their serrated home.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The massive, armored corpse of a Rustacean. It smells of old blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Muscovite fronds slouch under their mineralic weight. Whatever nears and eclipses its sunlight is flogged for its wrongdoing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In its infancy, rock streamed through the planet in plumes of magma, spilled into hushed caverns, and quickened pools of protoplasm out of its stilled inertia. Plates slipped and matter was crushed, pressurized. Later, as entropy bore cracks into the crust, sticky lifethings fused to the rock and scuttled forth. In geological terms they are tiny things, but you insist that scale is the wrong one.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The bright red, rock-encrusted corpse of a great magma crab.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
Words fail to contain the paradox of =pronouns.possessive= domesticated immensity.
Drifts on the cultural seas have swept a particular fable to your attention. Long ago, far away, folks supposed all of everything rested on the back of a world-tortoise. Surely that flight of fancy came to someone gazing on a Great Saltback... or does your own vision echo through the past to partake in its creation?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here an ossified world occupies space. It's only dead in the narrow sense. The yeast that colonizes its ridges doesn't see it that way, nor does the yearning past.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Everything near the bantam mammal is damp: fur, hair, leaves, soil, slick silver alloys. It's as if =pronouns.subjective==verb:'re:afterpronoun= a furry world unto =pronouns.reflexive=, and the sweet, sickening, evaporated honey about =pronouns.objective= is =pronouns.possessive= atmosphere.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Albino legs thrust =pronouns.possessive= turgid thorax through the air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sharp, sticky mandible.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Broken chitin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chitin was shaved from the exoskeletal flank of a caught salthopper and dry-beaten to a snappy crisp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ovoid spots, crimson and coral and citrine, run the course of =pronouns.possessive= torso and head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This robot =verb:bear= a featureless chrome plate for a face and treads for locomotion. Attached to the ends of each of =pronouns.possessive= grooved, steel arms spins a rusty rotary saw.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This ancient medical robot is shaped like a squat, friendly dwarf, with =pronouns.possessive= painted features long worn away to swaths of pitted metal. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:reach:afterpronoun= a helpful arm out, holding a stubby booster injector, ready to cheerfully cleanse the world of all its varied disease.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a small crossbow with a wide barrel to hold darts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This massive dirt-cowled leech undulates towards the smell of blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This huge, bloated leech's skin is taut, =pronouns.possessive= insides full of drained blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Verdurous leaves crushed flat cloak the diminutive figure against the jungle's undergrowth. But the Naphtaali ruse doesn't end there. A mask weaved from coarse plant fiber veils the emotive face of the rootdweller. Only the trees know whose hoary visage they don.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skimming the underbrush, sailing on air, a shiny ooid of perfect chrome reflects the dim light peeking through the canopy's braided tresses. A larger version of the knit mask worn by the Naphtaali rootdwellers adorns =pronouns.possessive= surface in imitation of a face. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:rotate:afterpronoun= with specious purpose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Like a leaf-strewn mound of root lies the corpse of a Naphtaali rootdweller.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: There are inglenooks on the hearths of spacetime where darkling things are. They are impossibly cavernous and yet impossibly narrow. Thusly it's explained how this gargantuan spider has legs that are crushed into the paper thinness of the void. They rise in lines like black braids in the night until a joint shunts them off in another direction, back toward the thing's crumpled thorax and panting glands.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The stony, sloughed skin of a basilisk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The stony, sloughed skin of a basilisk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This arthropod =verb:undulate= forward on hundreds of chittering legs. Tiny, needle-pointed quills jut out from between plates of chitin along =pronouns.possessive= protracted body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hulking corpse of an enormous, spiny quillipede.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inverted hands are soaked in the blood of fauna whose minds were tricked by the patterned bunches of its unbananas. Its fronds are stiffer than its looksake.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hulking mass of decaying flesh, the corpse of the salt kraken smells of the distant west wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Motes of salt fill the notches in =pronouns.possessive= chitin, which form a record of every other scorpiock =pronouns.subjective==verb:'ve:afterpronoun= wrestled and garroted. Behind, =pronouns.possessive= stinger coils in harmonic perfection.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's the bloated corpse of a scorpiock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slab of scorpiock meat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glistening barrels of silvery fleshstuff shudder in ecstasy until they tear into two, pause in a moment of reprieve, then resume their rapturous dithering.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tissue was mineralized while it grew and then snapped off the tree of living things to become an artifact of life.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Delicate; a bit crunchy, but refined!

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Delicate; a bit crunchy, but refined!

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Wafer thin, with a hint of toffee. Delicious!

part.Name: Food
part.Message: Far too gooey for your taste.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: These appear to be the flattened remains of some vainglorious humanoid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The patchwork of burnt metal and rust-flaked rivets make a gradient of newflesh across the hermit's body. =pronouns.Possessive= hair is knotted into a rat's nest and held high by a barrette of broken glass. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:scream:afterpronoun= in a tongue of =pronouns.possessive= own invention.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A massive, muscular boar, with an un-naturally long snout. The torpid slugsnout can spit massive, solid slugsnout slugs, made out of the compacted undigestible sinew of =pronouns.possessive= prey, out of =pronouns.possessive= slugsnout snout.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Each head of this bristled pig bears two elongated snouts through which it sneezes rock-hard pellets of dried mucus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tussocks of fur dress skin stretched over taut muscle. Upright =pronouns.subjective= =verb:stand:afterpronoun=, but =pronouns.subjective= =verb:look:afterpronoun= ready to drop onto fours. =pronouns.Possessive= snout snarls and =pronouns.possessive= ears twitch. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:bark:afterpronoun=, and =pronouns.possessive= hyena tribesmen answer.

xtagTextFragments.Activity: hunting and gathering,nomadic living,raiding villages,howling at the Beetle Moon,picking the meat off bones
xtagTextFragments.VillageActivity: sleeping in our bedrolls and sitting in our chairs,lounging around,reading books,peeling and eating musa,howling at the moon,picking the meat off discarded bones
xtagTextFragments.NeedsItemFor: for my own collection,to slake my greed,because of its trade value,to inspire my art,to inspire my poetry,to snarl at meaninglessly,as something to howl at,to be my muse,to help with farm work,for the games we play under the Beetle Moon
xtagTextFragments.SacredThing: the act of procreating,philosophy,the tilled land of others,howling at the Beetle Moon,snarling,picking the meat from bones,alcohol,grains of the earth,stone fruit,artistry,poetry,warm meals,bread and wine,pottery,painting
xtagTextFragments.ArableLand: defenseless villages,hapless farmers,the homes of sedentary creatures

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The thing's pulvilli crackle and pop to an aharmonic rhythm. It caroms from spot to spot, galvanized by a primordial impulse.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The bowl-like scutum is scratched in the furcate patterns of an electric arc.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A squat, jittery insect, the spark tick ripples with tiny arcs of static electricity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A weapon mounted on an automated tripod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A semi-automatic pistol mounted on a small tripod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chaingun mounted on a tripod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A laser mounted on a tripod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Three steel barrels fit together into an arc-edged triangle of luminous ritualism. They sit on a servo-articulated base mount.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rocket launcher mounted on a tripod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Delicate, viridian tendrils curl inward, and then spring open and loosen seeds at high speeds.

Only when =pronouns.subjective= =verb:spring:afterpronoun= to life, =pronouns.possessive= countless limbs popping with thousands of electrical sparks, does =pronouns.possessive= great danger present itself.

Soaking fibers of inky, unkempt hair enswathe the great, pale rocks that are =pronouns.possessive= shoulders. Crossed over =pronouns.possessive= chest are two carbide axes, their shafts knurled and rotting with rust. Jotun's rumpled eyelids lay half-shut over the discs of =pronouns.possessive= sluggish eyes as =pronouns.subjective= =verb:recline:afterpronoun= in =pronouns.possessive= bath of convalessence.

part.Short: A latticework of frost sticks to Fjorn-Kosef's coarse beard and bushy brow hair. The great, bony slab of =pronouns.possessive= head is obscured behind =pronouns.possessive= icy breath, and swathing =pronouns.possessive= anemic, misshaped arms are long strands of icy filament.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A man-sized cylinder hovers just above the floor. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:emit:afterpronoun= a low, menacing hum as =pronouns.subjective= =verb:glide:afterpronoun= slowly, searching for intruders with =pronouns.possessive= many protruding sensor arrays. A long, articulated arm, ending in a sparking rod, dangles from =pronouns.possessive= side.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A gang of tiny, plastic gyroscopes undulates toward you. For what purpose were they originally designed to serve? The echo of that memory has long since waned in the chrome halls of Qud.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small, gnarled machine. =pronouns.Possessive= form has been twisted by long years repairing =pronouns.reflexive= with the random detritus of Qud.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Heat, pressure, beauty, and transformation are concepts understood by every manner of human being. When the sundry tribes commune by campfire and the hillfolk aver the godliness of the mountain face, so does the troglodyte speak with wonderment of the splayed crystal-things that glint in the shadows of her cave. Though neither has the language to articulate the mechanisms that connect them, together they know these things are the same.

Whereas nature had the decency to end the body of the common slug in a muscular foot, Slog's tail is instead a sphincter-choked bilge hose that =pronouns.subjective= =verb:use:afterpronoun= to spew at =pronouns.possessive= prey the filth of the Cloaca.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quickened to life, or something akin to life, by the ionic exchange between an ultra-reactive primordial soup and its liquid cousin, the sludge repeats a process played out on trillions of star-orbiting world-rocks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
Is it a coincidence that the knotted, erumpent throng of organ that is Pax Klanq is shaped in the vague form of a humanoid, or is the prodigy fungus welcoming =pronouns.possessive= extradimensional anthropoid visitors with a warm gesture? In either case, =pronouns.possessive= splendid orange cap looks like a fancy hat. The semblance ends there, however; in place of a face, there's only a trio of undulating tentacles.
At the edges of your field of vision, more tentacles writhe over tools, books, circuitboards, frog cadavers, and saltwater pearls. You realize just how many things Klanq does at once, and you wonder at Nature's decision to bestow peak organic wit to a fungus.

part.Short:
One star-ribboned night, a ray cat crossed the marshy loam and wandered into Joppa. The watervine farmers, wakened by the joyful cries of a small girl, gathered around to revel at the favorable omen and extol the generosity of the Beetle Moon. Since then, Ctesiphus =verb:have= spent =pronouns.possessive= days curled under the shade of brinestalk huts and sauntering over dirt paths. So long as =pronouns.subjective==verb:'re:afterpronoun= approached with care, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:welcome:afterpronoun= the hands of friends and strangers alike.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: O, she doth pale red apples by her cheek! That cheek which doth proclaim the rite of spring, And heretofore hath nature's grand technique, Ne'er ripened lips so red from which to sing. Begone, false sun! I know thee for a fraud. Her fairest skin illuminates the day. All gold is brass and e'ery jewel is flawed, When set beside the sums her eyes might pay. The Spindle, which from Omonporch ascends, Must surely be her likeness brightly wrought, And as a likeness, fails to apprehend, The artless beauty that its makers sought. Did I know love or beauty? No, for shame! For I knew neither 'til they spoke her name.

One hand holds a purring blade. The other, lame and frostbitten, reminds us that while Mother Nature may bestow splendid gifts upon her children, she is still sister to Cruelty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: As strange as it seems, the mayor's hulking frame and alabaster fur identify =pronouns.objective= unmistakably as an albino ape. =pronouns.Possessive= flanks have softened and swollen, however, on account of a sedentary life unknown to =pronouns.possessive= savage brothers and sisters, and in place of contorted rage =pronouns.subjective= wears an aspect of reflective wonder. =pronouns.Subjective= =verb:clothe:afterpronoun= =pronouns.reflexive= in a crude toga, a beaten, wide-brimmed hat, and a walking stick upon which =pronouns.subjective= doesn't lean but rather brandishes in a stately manner.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Beneath a mane of coarse hair, Warden Indrix's lips move without issuing forth any sound, perhaps in the formation of a litany invoked in the name of the vengeful god =pronouns.subjective= =verb:serve:afterpronoun=. The coarse hair grows in an uninterrupted mass down =pronouns.possessive= torso, that of a human but broader and more taut with muscle than any man's, disappearing only behind the sash of =pronouns.possessive= kilt. But for Mayor Nuntu and the warden =pronouns.reflexive=, no one knows the circumstances of Indrix's estrangement from =pronouns.possessive= kin, for no one dares mention it lest they draw the warden's ire. One of =pronouns.possessive= great curling horns has been cleanly cloven from =pronouns.possessive= head, however. That same horn along with several others hang from a belt slung low about Indrix's hips, giving =pronouns.objective= the distinction of being the only warrior to bear =pronouns.possessive= own appendage as a trophy.

part.Name: Description

Upon closer scrutiny, you discern the hilts of =pronouns.possessive= twin swords, Caslainard and Polluxus, rising through the foliage of =pronouns.possessive= cloak and over =pronouns.possessive= shoulders. =pronouns.Possessive= sylvan sashes, of which =pronouns.subjective= =verb:wear:afterpronoun= several, are strewn with the ears, claws, and horns of creatures unfamiliar to you, and as you examine them, =pronouns.subjective= =verb:scrutinize:afterpronoun= you wearing an expression that bears qualities of both a smirk and a scowl yet that is not quite either.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This nude, brown-skinned figure alternates between kneeling low before the shrine of Oboroqoru and skulking around it observantly. =pronouns.Possessive= body is black with the dirt of the earth, but =pronouns.possessive= face is uncharacteristically clean, and you notice every so often =pronouns.subjective= =verb:uncork:afterpronoun= a waterskin that hangs around =pronouns.possessive= neck, =verb:moisten:afterpronoun= =pronouns.possessive= hands, and =verb:scrub:afterpronoun= the grime from =pronouns.possessive= cheeks and brow. Oboroqoru's worshipers deem this rite a more meaningful use of their precious freshwater than even the quenching of thirst, and in presenting unsullied faces to the idol of their ape god, they hope to propitiate him and garner his favor and protection.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stone idol of Oboroqoru stands twenty spans tall. Its nameless sculptor chose to depict the ape god sitting cross-legged with each of his three pairs of gargantuan arms grasping each other. The idol is swathed in vines, its caretakers ceding to nature save where the herbage has threatened to obscure Oboroqoru's gentle countenance. Wreaths of flowers of every hue the forest begets -- azure, chartreuse, indigo, carnelian -- litter the base of the shrine, insignificant offerings to what appears to be a callous god.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: You stand not at the foot of a wintry knoll but beneath a mountain of muscle, swathed in blanched fur, that must be nature's crowning jewel. Cast from the mold of the great apes (or perhaps the exemplar from which those apes were molded), the living god differs only in that =pronouns.subjective= =verb:bear:afterpronoun= not two but six arms, each of which might be the fleeced bole of an ancient yew. =pronouns.Possessive= fists are of proportions that suggest the might with which hoary gods beat the mountains into shape when the earth was young. However, =pronouns.possessive= aspect bears not a shred of that divine fury; =pronouns.subjective= =verb:don't:afterpronoun= rage but instead =verb:sit:afterpronoun= in contemplation of eons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: There's a saying among the vintners who hoist their sails toward the Stilt. 'One rose is fair; five is death.' Indeed, when a single shawl swathes her face and the Esthers are one, there is peace beneath the Stilt. But when she's joined by her sisters, and scarlet ribbons thrash in the desert air, there is only blood and justice.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spectacles rest on =pronouns.possessive= pointy nose. =pronouns.Possessive= nails are caked with graphite, and reams of graph paper are splayed across =pronouns.possessive= desks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The crab farmer slouches in the heat. A beaten, leather hat is pulled low over =pronouns.possessive= eyes and sweat glistens on the scruffs of hair on =pronouns.possessive= cheeks. =pronouns.Possessive= hands are caked in mud and salt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glorious Shekhinah, Argent Adonis and First Father, poses in luminous mummery. With the stature of the ageless stars, fixed and permanent, He appraises the temple erected in His honor and cocks His head in approval. Befitting the memory of His union with the Kasaphescence, He clothes His manifestation in cerulean shades, forsaking the viridians and russets of the lowly plants and clay earth.

part.Name: Chat
part.Says: [Shekhinah turns toward you, His arms wide.]

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Statue of god.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nisroch the star mason is depicted here straddling the earth with his mighty legs. He dons his favorite sash, whose folds are exquisitely worked in gold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The statue of Bel wears its tremendous weight in polished marble. He wields his epochal aegis, storied for obstructing a swirling gas cloud in the starry dawn.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here Shekhinah has been sculpted into permanence with magnificent cerulean marble. His body is chiseled to blessed perfection. His golden diadem crowns him Father among Fathers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dagon the orator domineers the west apse with his brazen pose. His golden coronet shines splendidly in the fire's shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carthax the athlete is depicted here mid-stride. His glistening silver hair is tied behind his head, in astral tradition, as he vaults through the firmament.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Resheph, who's called 'the Above', lifts an enigmatic finger to heal the wounds of the sick.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The polished bronze glows by the firelight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large, storage vase with a decorative slip. The style hints that it was fired in the home-kiln of a canyon dweller.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A vessel of exquisitely blown glass. The style hints that it originates from the coast of Fuming God Sea, on the far side of Moghra'yi, and that it was likely exported by the dromads.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glass was blown to a wide bowl and thin stem in the tradition of the grove-carpeted mountain lagynos. Were the style's first artisans working through the thick and ripe air of the musa wood? Did Spindle glitter dust their marvers and pipes?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A clay pitcher with a decorative slip. The style hints that it was fired in the home-kiln of a canyon dweller.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bronze was melted and cooled, shaped and etched, to deliver the water of life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was rounded and kilned to store oils and wine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was rounded and kilned to store oils and wine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was rounded and kilned to store oils and wine.

object.Name: Jug Wide Eastern Style with Wine

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was spun on the potter's wheel and shaped into waves, fired, and glazed into a traditional vessel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sphinx scenes of post-Edification glamour are arrayed in gold and sunken relief around the lip of the black marble fount. The tracery of its bright veins spikes the eye but, downwell, recedes into the starless depth.

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: Have you honey to share, little one?

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: Get out of my way. Not that it matters.

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: Shh! Did you hear that? Is it a puma? Oh, nevermind.

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: Ooo! Eeee! My friend, you could learn a thing about dressing =player.reflexive=.

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: Come sit by the fire and sip burnydrink.

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: May the ground shake but the Six Day Stilt never tumble.

tag.Name: HeroNameTitleCognomen
tag.Value: chosen by Shekhinah,Chrome-Tauted,Favorite of the Argent Fathers,Baetyl Boy

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: Go East. The Voice in the Void calls us all.

tag.Name: SimpleConversation
tag.Value: One day, you shall bathe in the pureblood of our dead. Then you will know immaculacy. Then will you know truth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sweet starapples were mashed, set over an open flame, left out to cool, and jarred for later use. Bits of stringy pulp lay suspended in the fruity aether.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ageless bone was pulverized and compacted inside the scarred intestine of a bone worm. Then it was ground into meal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Grave moss grew into a rare and supple clump, which was then crushed and placed on a spice tray.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Peeled lagroot tuber was mashed, salted, and jarred.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Moisture was baked out of fruit by the salt sun, but Spindle glitter still alights the disc-chip.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An artifact of the mirror world was shattered and ground to fine dust.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: RulesDescription

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Insects buzz in a hungry crowd around the meaty yellow-brown petals of this growing flower stalk. The plant twitches when touched; is it dreaming of a way to lash out at the creatures around it?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Very chewy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny coral petals sprout from the top of a flimsy stem. The hoof of a wildebeest, be it carbon or chrome, has crushed its siblings and spread into acidic fibers into the soil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Children cry at the crisp snip of a yuckwheat stem, as they have for hundreds of years. They bawl, and flail, and writhe from their mothers' grasps, deaf to reassurances of the plant's medical potency. Snipped and crushed, the stem tastes acidic on their tongues and their faces contort in children's agony. But they sleep better at night, so their mothers say.

part.Name: Food
part.Message: It's bland but for a film of fat. Why were the precursors so averse to knowing what they ate?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The stencil on the tin depicts an animal with claws, or are they hooves? Snoods (or horns? antlers?) pucker its nose and brow. Shaggy, knotted fur, or ruffled feathers, sheath it from the heat (or cold).

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Philosophers like to distill things into their essences. When a pedagogue walks his student through a vineyard, he points to the rustling leaves, the crushed grass, the empty sky, and he asks the student what is essential about each of them. Unbeknownst to both teacher and student, tucked away in a forgotten corner of the world, such an essential berry grows.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description

The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Short: This humongous skull of a rhinox is made of some of the hardest organic materials known to man. A massive shaft of steel has been driven through the maw and welded to the interior of the skull, producing an enormous maul.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A flanged rod of slate grey metal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ring magnets form a cylindric mace-head to bash against objects and syphon their electron juice into a battery slotted on the shaft.

part.Name: SapChargeOnHit
part.BehaviorDescription: On a successful hit, drains electrical charge from its target and its target's equipment and transfers the charge to the energy cell slotted into itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crudely constructed metal knife.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long, humming white blade extends an arm's length from a dense black plastic hand-grip.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When charged, this weapon's penetration value is equal to the defender's armor value.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This simple magazine-loaded rifle is a common hunting gun in the tribes of men.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A composite carbine with a banana-shaped magazine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This sturdy bolt action rifle has a long, expertly rifled barrel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This simple muzzle-loading musket is inaccurate, but is sometimes used by the desert tribes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A motley cacophany of short wire loops surrounds a long metal rail. An ungainly stock and magazine are mounted to the side.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Atop this russet rifle stands a square plate-scope inset with a large ocular lens. The sight through the lens distorts as the gun tilts, but the vector drawn of the shot remains unchanged.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cold to the touch, this sleek rifle bears a long, slender chrome barrel. Tendrils of icy vapor coil out of the muzzle.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rifled prism that refracts and refocuses light to tunnel things toward its wielder. Sophists call it a 'here ray'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a basic single-barrel chain-loaded rifle, powered by a simple, self-winding flywheel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rugged 6-shot pistol, the borderlands revolver is the workhorse of the borderlands gunslingers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The craftsmanship of this pistol worked in chrome and brass is breathtaking -- grips of kingswood wrap your palm around themselves, the hammer is contoured to your thumb with infinitesimal precision, the eye of the barrel leers at your target. Twines of withered ivy are engraved along its frame and down its barrel stained with age and blood.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 Ego Critical hits scored with this weapon bestow a +4 bonus to its penetration rolls. Whenever you discharge a full barrel of ammo with this weapon, you automatically score a critical hit with the last shot you fire.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You recovered the masterwork pistol and legendary ode to vengeance, the =this=.
part.Hagiograph: The gunslinger-sultan =name= slew each of the seven lords of House Isner with a masterwork revolver and supped over their piled corpses.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cylinder-less pistol with acrylic grips.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A handheld machine gun with a narrow barrel and an extended magazine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This basic shotgun can be deadly at very close range, but is very inaccurate at even moderate distances.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stockless, pump-action shotgun of jet black.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A handful of pellets encased in a thick wax-paper and plastic shell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A lump of lead.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A humming curve of metal, a dim beam of light connects the endpoints of the crescent. When fingers are drawn through the beam, a blazing arrow of energy springs from the weapon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A handheld grenade launcher with a steel, girthy barrel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A basic shoulder-mounted missile launcher.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A basic missile, tipped with a highly explosive warhead.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The barrel of this 'pistol' is a small, transparent tube. Inside it you can see a small, twirling mote of purest blackness, pulsing with entrancing beauty and menace.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simple recurve bow made from the stiff leg-bones of a salthopper.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Some tinker has fastened wheels to the limbs of this bow. Cables work to accentuate the archer's strength, mechanically flexing the limbs further inward as the string is drawn.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Servos click on the wheeling groves and a miniature air turbine exaggerates the pull of the bowstring.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: This weapon increases the base penetration of its ammo by 4. This weapon increases the damage die of its ammo by 4. This weapon increases the damage bonus of its ammo by 1.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A short wooden arrow, fletched with glowcrow feathers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A steel-headed arrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Reds and oranges swirl in the bulbous arrowhead. Ignition is a notch away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A carbide-headed arrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An arrow with a folded carbide head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fullerite-headed arrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crysteel-headed arrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An arrow with a flawless crysteel head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A zetachrome-headed arrow.

part.Short: A flame-throwing apparatus.

part.Step: Optional: Locate the Weapons Cache in the Tomb of the Eaters

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hand pump slides into a chrome canister with illustrations of wilting plants etched in relief.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hand pump slides into a chrome canister with illustrations of rotting fungi etched in relief.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thick shell of bone and chitin, the carapace covers a majority of the body with its armor plates.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Long, slim, keratinous spikes that present a menacing facade to attackers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of massive, feathered wings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chitinous, segmented tail tapering into a curved barb slick with venom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of massive, curling horns. They can deliver devastating gore attacks to enemies.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron hooks can be fastened to residual leg limbs, providing a kind of graceless, scraping locomotion for their wearer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Some facial appendages are so sightly, scattering light like the prismatic loam or curving toward geometric bliss. But there are many others.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Huge spade-like claws as hard as any natural substance (and many unnatural).

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ghostly, flickering flames drift up.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ghostly mist drifts up.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The air in this area shimmers with intense heat, as if filled with an invisible fire.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A frigid, cloying mist hangs in the air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An elaborate, flap-powered contraption of corroded bronze and parasols.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Articulated blades unfold to form an aerial screw that gets blown upward by an air thruster mounted below. On activation, the equipper takes flight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This pair of prosthetic hands are attached to the ends of two telescoping, multi-jointed chrome rods which fasten into a thin plastic case designed to be worn on the back.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small wooden shield meant to be strapped to the arm, leaving the hands free.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small iron shield meant to be strapped to the arm, leaving the hands free.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small steel shield meant to be strapped to the arm, leaving the hands free.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large shield, meant to be secured to your hand.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A black aegis bearing the cross of the Putus Templar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rust stripes this ageless, flat-faced buckler. Painted on its face is the coat of arms of an archaic house -- white runic script on a field of crimson.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 Ego You may activate this item to conjure a force field in front of you. Robots will often be unable to advance toward you while the force field is active.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You recovered the lost aegis of House Yish, =this=.
part.Hagiograph: Recall how =name= wrested the legendary aegis =this= from the paws of a lowly snapjaw and averred descendency from the Saads of Yish!

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A frock of slate cloth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rough and itchy flax was coarsely threaded, cut to shape, and cinched by a hemp rope.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ornately sewn mantle of slate cloth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sewn mantle of chromaic fabric ornately embroidered with a thousand stitches.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish nursed in the aquarium silos of a vacated sector were netted and skinned into strips. Those strips were tanned with chrome and stitched into this vest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This frock is knit from imperishable uuflax stolen from an archway garden during a union dispute between the weavers' guild and the high-strata window makers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wrested from the liminal tiers of a shale-toppled spire, this animal skull was handed over to an etcher for decoration.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market and sewn into a headdress.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Masks maintained their sacred status in the lives of the Eaters, even as they lost the capacity to stitch them into their own faces. This one is no different.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market and stitched into a talma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish leather was worn by fishworkers in the earlier sultanate, but by the time of *sultan* it was prized by gentlefolk. This pair is exquisitely crafted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: While the steeple fires raged below, brave arconauts sank into the glowing depths to retrieve valuables. When their corpses were found, the sand in their pockets had been blown into glass beads. This bracelet was made from such beads.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish leather boots, finest make. They were either stolen from the crypt of an older Eater or fashioned by a cordwainer to look like it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chipped-off chunk of Spindle, magnetized by the fall to earth, orbits its chosen warden.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Far from the soaring aegides of earlier periods, this concave ward was merely bent and polished on a municipal lathe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome flakes fell like dander from broken belfries into the trash sea. They were scooped up by orefishers and traded up the silk chain. This shirt is fashioned from the flakes twisted into rings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Early period Eaters modded their genes to grow ur-filament hair. Later, once that technology was lost, graverobbers sheared it from their cadaverous scalps. In the time of *sultan*, it was called finery. This vest was knit from the stuff.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Early Eaters had enlarged their skulls for cosmetic reasons. By the time of *sultan*, the high minaret dwellers took to wearing them as helms. This one is exquisitely decorated.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Early period Eaters modded their genes to grow ur-filament hair. Later, once that technology was lost, graverobbers sheared it from their cadaverous scalps. In the time of *sultan*, it was called finery. This hat was knit from the stuff.

part.Name: Description

part.Short: This cloak was knit from strands ur-filament hair robbed from the graves of early Eaters.

part.Short: Heavy, plated boots made of welded slabs of fullerite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This opaline, phosphorescent globe glows with the light of auroras absorbed eons ago. It floats about preternaturally.~J211

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A black aegis bearing the cross of the Putus Templar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This vest of densely woven fibre -- the strands dug right up from the ancient, stinking ground -- is light and flexible, but nearly indestructible.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A veil cut from a thin, woven fabric.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a billowing cloak of material so light as to feel totally weightless when held. Any light illuminating it scintillates into a thousand rainbow motes, dazzling the eye with its brilliance, and causing the tunic to seem to swim in midair.
