part.Name: Description
part.Short: A flawless crysteel aegis.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pustulent girdle that slowly undulates with latent vitality.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: While equipped you take half damage from poison.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Miniature airfoil blades spin on the circular face and blow gentle air.

part.Name: TemperatureAdjuster
part.BehaviorDescription: Provides a small amount of cooling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wrist-mounted display device that gives a detailed readout of the life signs of biological entities in its surroundings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wrist-mounted display device that gives a detailed readout on the structural integrity of simple inanimate objects in its surroundings.

object.Name: Child of the Deep Structural Scanning Bracelet

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wrist-mounted force-field emitter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
A plastic band with a recessed button on a chrome faceplate.
"You think this is the real =name=? It is."

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hieroglyphs of fluctation are incised on the inner surface of this shiny metal torus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
Visual Instrument and Sensory Augmentation (G Edition)
Data is painted back and forth between the glass lunes of visor and wristlet. Whereas the outer trim shines gold on F Edition, on this model it fades to grey.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's worked from otherworldly limestone. The stone was quarried from a drift-world spinning about a darkling star whose weak luminescence didn't bleach the voidstuff from the rock's coral. Now it insulates its slumberer from the rays of materiality and conducts them to the psychic aether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plutonic metal is etched with a two-dimensional projection of the rhombic dodecahedral honeycomb, allowing it to snap onto the ley lines of the local region.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An arm-mounted wearable computer.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: When equipped and powered, this item grants a bonus to identifying artifacts as if your Intelligence score were increased by 2.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Diodes burn their cyan light through an atmosphere of glass curved around a metal link.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: When equipped and powered, this item grants a bonus to identifying artifacts as if your Intelligence score were increased by 2.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Witchwood twigs pared and twisted into a decorative wreath.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A comely, multicolored shawl sure to distinguish its wearer from the rest of the pack.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A soft-soled shoe worked from boar hide.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of cracked leather sandals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: These beads were skillfully dyed and strung together by a hillside native.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Colorful rings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Silver was melted and cast to a perfect sphere in isomorphic veneration of the Kasaphescence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This filthy, beaten hat was drawn low over countless wearers' eyes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A delver's vest covered in a dense tangle of webbing and a plethora of pockets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a very fancy smiling sun mask. It smells faintly of ancient, dried grapes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a highly decorative frowning moon mask. Gazing at it makes you feel somewhat sleepy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a spectacularly crafted sun and moon mask. It makes you feel uneasy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In wool paper and acrylic the pain of experience is smoothed away into the aspect of a child. Neuronal clamps peak out from the concave interior surface. The mask is fastened by a brass chain, adorned by beads of glass, and branded on the forehead with the Holy Rhombus, a sign of the price of innocence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In wool paper and acrylic the pain of experience is smoothed away into the uniform child's cone. Arterial clamps peak out from the interior surface. The cone is fastened by a brass chain, adorned by beads of glass, and branded on the apex with the Holy Rhombus, a sign of the price of innocence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The glass lune is showered in information across the electromagnetic channels.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A copper ring bespattered with worm blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ageless dark, stained robes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dark, soot-stained robes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long, hooded cloak white-washed from years of exposure to the desert sun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long, twisted braid of shock-white ape hair.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shawl woven of fine, scarlet silk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A huge pile of stinking, lice-infested animal hide.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This simple tunic is woven of stiff plant fiber. It's surprisingly comfortable.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This airy robe is woven from fine cloth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A kilt woven of thick plaid wool.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This toga is fashioned of crude, roughly woven textile.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This toga has been well-used, as togas are wont to be.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Boar hide was brined, limed, and put in a tanning drum. It was cut and fitted into an apron, and now it's a brown canvas for knife scars and tong burns.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This well-worn set of overalls are made from sturdy cloth, and covered in small pockets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of thick overlapping slabs of rock-hard bark, sewn to a coarse, itchy plant-fiber undergarment. It smells pretty good.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of leather armor has been cured until it is rock hard.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Swaddled in green growth, its wearer becomes another country-cloaked and time-eaten statue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of hard leather armor is covered in metal studs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A utilitarian leather skullcap.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A close-fitting hood, woven of crimson fabric.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slender cut of brass painted and intricately worked into the shape of a poisonous serpent.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hard leather gloves worn by the moisture farmers of Joppa to protect their hands from the briary watervine fronds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sturdy set of leather gloves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A well-worn pair of leather boots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hideous, plated skull with gaping beak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of dozens of thick rings of metal, which have been sewn into a padded leather undershirt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A protective shirt of tiny, interlocked metal links.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A well-worn pair of leather boots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A decorative clay pot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of metal boots, with thick magnetic soles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tough leather cloak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cloak made of dark fabric, which hangs with supernatural heavyness even in a strong wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A salt-spangled crimson banner of the Issachari nomad people.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Air circulates and the sheet-standard breathes; the edges of the red diamond shrink and lengthen. Blood courses through the arteries of time and into the tissue of the new flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A veil cut from a thin, flame-retardant fabric woven by the Issachari nomad tribes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thick, banded steel gauntlets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thick, banded carbide gauntlets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pearl fastens these well-crafted sandals. The natives believe they belonged to the nymphs who inhabit the river beneath Red Rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mote of gentle light darts about.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Emits light in radius 4. Extinguished permanently when unequipped.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A brass compass fastened to a leather wristband.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large, moss-colored pack equipped with shoulder straps and a hip belt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This vest is cut from the chitinous exoskeleton molted by Qud's jungle puma; thick, flexible rings the color of tree bark protect the torso of its wearer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cap made of a stretchy black fabric that sticks to the scalp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A swath of verdant forest loam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: These skin-tight gloves occasionally jolt the hands into performing with added strength and dexterity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slippers made of a stretchy black fabric that sticks to your feet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal frames are mounted on treads to protect against wheel-cramming detritus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of boarskin gloves trimmed with the alabaster fur of an albino ape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gloves made of a stretchy black fabric that sticks to your hands.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of gloves, made of chain-mail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of boots, made of chain-mail sewn over thick leather backing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of leather boots onto which several steel bands have been riveted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of leather boots onto which several carbide bands have been riveted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hollowed-out, xanthous shell of the electric snail armors the head while only minorly impairing vision.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The moss-strewn antlers of some great elk appear to have grown from atop this ageless, leather helm.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The moss-strewn antlers of some great elk appear to have grown from atop this ageless, leather helm.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A conical helm of polished steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A leather hat with ear flaps lined with the alabaster fur of an albino ape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cloak cut from the furry, alabaster hide of an albino ape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A square, black cap with a gold tassel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A heavy coif of densely interlinked chain-mail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bodysuit made of a stretchy black fabric that sticks to the torso.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of many large plates of forged metal over a layer of chain-mail. The whole mass is stiched to an under-garment of leather and padding.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A leather strap with an affixed lamp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of oddly shaped goggles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sturdy helmet, with built in illumination.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A piece of thick burlap, impregnated with vinewood sap, helping to protect against noxious gas and vapor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A durable mask of plastic, fitted with a simple filter that provides good protection against dangerous gas and vapor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Curved glass caps the narrowest in a series of concentric brass tubes. The widest one is fitted with a leather head-strap.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: Grants a bonus to identifying artifacts as if your Intelligence score were increased by 5.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Vision-correcting lenses on thin wire frames.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome-brass rings and swarths of leather are precisely cut from a tinker's stencil, but the real signature is on the glass: a scatter of speck-sized fractures from the high salt gales.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light flecks break themselves on the silver moat and rush back to their place of origin. The signifier becomes the signified; the simulacrum is realized.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A convex, translucent lens the size of a man's torso and suspended in thin air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A starless, triangular prism of black glass.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You clutched the black glass of the =this= in your hands.
part.Hagiograph: Amaranthine =name=! Cover before the god-sultan who is wrought of =their= own dreamstuff and who bears the black glass!

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bees crawl over the back-mounted slatted rack. A few more dart around nearby.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gridlines and a red dot are painted on the glass lune, and simple rectangles depict the once-ordered streets of chromium that've since burst like gnarled roots through space and time.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
Some clever tinker has fitted a spring-loaded tendon around each of these boots to mimic the gait of a large, sprinting bird.
&CAs long as you have worn this item for at least 100 rounds, you sprint at thrice your movement speed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An old ropeworking ritual was used to weave a back-worn net of fibrous and supportive straps.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of leather boots onto which several steel bands have been riveted. Grease has been applied to their soles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A vest cut from an elastyne mesh and reinforced with plastic.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This skin-tight flesh suit is made of elastic rubber.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stretchy, foam fabric hardens when pressure is applied to it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stretchy, foam fabric hardens when pressure is applied to it.

part.Name: ReduceEnergyCosts
part.ScopeDescription: the energy cost to apply an injector

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stretchy, foam fabric hardens when pressure is applied to it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stretchy, foam fabric hardens when pressure is applied to it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A knitted sleeve that warms as you wear it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stretchy, foam fabric hardens when pressure is applied to it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of overlapping slabs of thin-blue metal, welded to a chain-mail undergarment.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cloak of unrippable synthetic fabric.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The fine, decorated cloak of a Ibulian Praetorian.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit is made of extremely durable, rubbery, dark material. It is lined with small pouches which slowly filter water that the suit collects from your sweaty, overworked body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A helmet, camouflaged for the deep jungles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pearl fastens these well-crafted sandals. The natives believe they belonged to the nymphs who inhabit the river beneath Red Rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A coat of several frayed, varicolored patches stitched together.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A densely camouflaged leather jerkin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The teleprojector is a fluted visor of fused tungsten filament. Two antennae coil out of the temples.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of overlapping slabs of dense, durable plastic which have been bound to an under-layer of leather.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Animated birds flap and shift over the cloak's folds and ruffles. A myriad of species, sizes and colors.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is forged from massive slabs of black, unbreakable material.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of hundreds of small chips of fullerite, bound to a hard leather cuirass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dark, visored helmet made of jet black fullerite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The finned and wheeled boot had become the sigil of several sects of socionauts by the Late Sultanate. For decades their progenitors careened through the capsule pipelines of the slouching arcology, dismantling it plate by plate, pursued by the constabulary but ferried by their skates to the safety of their moss-skirted hideouts. The metaphor was writ large on the glass guts of the city: Scorch the past. Rocket into the future.

part.Name: TemperatureAdjuster
part.BehaviorDescription: Heats up the area around the wearer when in operation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prism-studded skin was shorn from a dead monkey and sawed into a hat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prism-studded skin was shorn from a dead monkey and sawed into a cloak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prism-studded skin was shorn from a dead monkey and sawed into a pair of gloves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Heavy, plated boots made of welded slabs of fullerite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Articulated gauntlets, made of many linked rings of fullerite.

part.Short: A different glyph for 'life' is etched into each shining chrome segment of the wristband.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slate tubes assembled to scaffold the human form.

part.Short: This is a billowing cloak of material so light as to feel totally weightless when held. Any light illuminating it scintillates into a thousand rainbow motes, dazzling the eye with its brilliance, and causing the tunic to seem to swim in midair.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Calligraphs are incised in uneven rows and columns that meander across the quarter and back stay of the boot. Their character mass appears to orbit a central statement: "The path is contracted." The rest of the script is etched in a variety of signs and styles that offer competing and composite interpretations of the cryptic proclamation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ur-metal strips on the soles are magnetized by bosonic coils, producing a continuous ribbon of negative-mass bubbles that repel the wearer upward.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Short: A colossal, clenched fist gilded with the blood of a demigod.

part.DisplayName: {{Y|Femur of Mjolkmjor, Who Let Them Pass}}

part.Short: A colossal, clenched fist gilded with the blood of a demigod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An array of tinkering utensils clang against tin: tweezers, a tiny hammer, pliers, inverted pliers, glass marbles, and three wrenches.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: This item increases the chance of recovering additional bits when you disassemble an artifact.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An array of tinkering utensils clang against carbide: voltmeter, polyjack, soldering knife, ion shield, circuitboard, and three spare vacuum tubes.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: When powered, this item greatly increases the chance of identifying artifacts and recovering additional bits when you disassemble artifacts. When unpowered, it functions as a basic toolkit, mildly increasing the chance of recovering additional bits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its head is a shard of fullerite, pointed on one end and flat on the other. Its handle is a pole of fiberglass and metal wrapped in fraying wood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A toboggan repels above the ground and gently rocks on an ethereal wave. It's encircled by a corona of wafting dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny glyphs are inscribed on each exterior face of the handheld box. Though contrarians still puzzle over their meaning, most of Qud's prominent linguist cults have converged on a single interpretation: 'For When Both Nature and Architects Have Failed You'. One brass pull ring separates you from the promise of those words.

One brass pull ring separates you from the promise of those words.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: What sort of giant manthing carried a forty-stone chrome satchel on their shoulder? The answer is not known. But a clue is stenciled on the side of the satchel: a drill pointing downward into a well.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ink is jetted into and under the skin canvas by a needle and rotary motor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ornately carved wood conceals a chrome interior. An inscription speaks to the Holy Rhombus, the blood of the Reclaimed, and the honor of digital servitude.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spurred on by their aspiration for a fully autonomous, climate-controlled banana grove, Research and Development at Hegemonic Fruit devised the neuro animator, which knits a nervous system into the inorganic material of inanimate objects. Originally, full sentience was their product diffentiator, but within months cheaper alternates like Spray-a-Brain came to dominate the market.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: "SPRAY-A-BRAIN: If these walls could talk..."

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small crystalline disk with a recessed button on top.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A heavy metal sphere, which hums quietly.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A plastic disk that shines with rainbow light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stamped plastic disk whose scratches shine with rainbow light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stamped plastic disk that shines with rainbow light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: "Surgeon Hegemon's Warning: Do Not Use on Human Hearts"

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Some tinker devised the spray bottle to dispense a liquid concoction that would have otherwise glued the skin of his hands together.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pink liquid gel eerily kneads the side of a glass tube. It hungers for freedom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chalky white pellet with the letters "HH" inscribed in tiny script.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A roll of gauze, suited to staunch bleeding.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slender metal tube, used to deliver various tonics directly into the bloodstream.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small crossbow with a wide barrel to hold darts.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You feel unusually amorous for about half a day, during which time you'll fall in love with the first thing you look at. If you inject someone else, they'll fall in love with you and follow you around for 3000-3600 rounds. There's a 4% failure rate for every level higher they are than you.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds +6 Strength +2 temporary hit points per level -25 move speed You cannot feel pain. You are immune to fear. You suffer 1% of your maximum hit points in damage each round (this damage cannot reduce you to below one hit point)
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds +9 Strength +3 temporary hit points per level -25 move speed You cannot feel pain. You are immune to fear. You suffer 1% of your maximum hit points in damage each round (this damage cannot reduce you to below one hit point)

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 1001-1200 rounds Your movement speed is increased by 25% at night and underground but reduced by 20% in the daylight. +3 Agility at night and underground -3 Agility in the daylight You can see in the dark (radius 8). You grow burrowing claws. You suffer double damage from light-based attacks.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 1001-1200 rounds Your movement speed is increased by 40% at night and underground but reduced by 20% in the daylight. +4 Agility at night and underground -3 Agility in the daylight You can see in the dark (radius 8). You suffer double damage from light-based attacks.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 18-22 rounds You are immune to confusing attacks. Your activated mental mutations cool down twice as quickly.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 18-22 rounds You are immune to confusing attacks. You peer into your near future (you may revert to the point in time at which you first used this drug at the end of its duration).

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds +8 DV There is a 25% chance per round that you phase out of the spatial dimension for 1-3 rounds.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds +8 DV You gain the ability to phase out of the spatial dimension for 7-9 rounds.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 10 rounds You recover 0.6 hit points per level (minimum 3) each round. At the end of the tenth round, you are purged of all short-term, biological debuffs and you regrow up to one severed appendage.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 10 rounds You recover 0.9 hit points per level (minimum 5) each round. At the end of the tenth round, you are purged of all short-term, biological debuffs and you regrow up to one severed appendage.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Duration: 41-50 rounds +100 electrical resist +25 cold resist -1 AV You receive a -5 penalty to bleeding saves. You only suffer half damage from bludgeoning attacks. You only suffer half damage from falling. You cannot be grabbed.
part.GenotypeAlt: Duration: 41-50 rounds +100 electrical resist +50 cold resist -1 AV You receive a -5 penalty to bleeding saves. You only suffer 25% damage from bludgeoning attacks. You only suffer 25% damage from falling. You cannot be grabbed.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You gain either a permanent +1 bonus to a random attribute or one mutation point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slender crystalline disk containing blueprints.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small piece of scrap.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small, strange little metal trinket.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small box of wax crayons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Odd metal tubes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fronds are splayed out in a waxy imitation of life. It looks hard and greasy up close, but as you back away its edges burn into softness and it performs the tree function.

part.Short: This figurine worked from *material* intricately depicts *creature.a**creature*:

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Short: A tiny, gleaming chunk of pure gold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tiny gemstone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The shadows of tiny nebulae are crushed into the contours of a small stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thousand sunrays are refracted through the prism of a small stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The black bellows of the earth are etched into red polish.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It spent millions of years tucked into the folds of earthly sediment. Then it was cracked from its cocoon, a brilliant butterfly.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Oceans reflecting the skies of a thousand fractal worlds are tucked into a geometric volume.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Impurities in the stone mother verdant things, the pattern of life repeated on a smaller scale.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It hurled through the void impacted in a black rock and slammed, shining and free, on our world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small, strange little metal trinket.

part.Short: When unobstructed, this copper sphere accelerates toward ceiling and sky.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cube that seems to have only four corners. Strange hieroglyphics cover each side alongside of crude scenes of a figure using a club to strike down a horned figure holding a time-piece of ancient make.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here lies the metallic husk of a defunct waydroid. It's been stripped of its valuables: copper wire, LED lights, and chrome bearings. It beeps and whirs no longer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here lies a waydroid in unknowing slumber. Might a willing tinker give it life again?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small metallic block, this is the most common energy cell seen in the wastes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spinning the stannic cuboid about any of its axes of rotation generates a pinch of resistance. A wrist strap and gyroscopic frame enable the cell to absorb and store its wearer's kinetic energy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shimmering silver cube, this cell will slowly recharge if left in sunlight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The small size of this cube belies its massive heft. It can power an artifact for much longer than a standard chem cell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This jet black wafer hums quietly, and seems to quiver with potential energy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the insulated cask of the battery, the electromotive apparatus cracks the energy out of acid and converts it to electrical charge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the insulated cask of the battery, the electromotive apparatus cracks the energy out of oil and converts it to electrical charge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the insulated cask of the battery, the electromotive apparatus cracks the energy out of lava and converts it to electrical charge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the insulated cask of the battery, the electromotive apparatus cracks the energy out of blood and converts it to electrical charge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A gorgeous, filament fractal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The filament from which this web is spun shimmers as it phases through the several dimensions of physical space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pool of liquid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Follow that yonder brocade.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The surface of this sphere is a window to another place, wrought in frosted-glass facets that seethe, almost imperceptably, in the corners of your vision.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An archway.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simple portal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simple portal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simple portal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simple portal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal is shaped to the arched doorway, and a slide panel is cut into its center.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simple, broad portal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Six crossed brinestalk pickets are attached to the fence by an iron latch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sturdy walkway made of smooth bricks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brick rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brick rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Marble rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black marble rectangles tesselate the path.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bridge made of dried brinestalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The wide, grated platform has largely escaped the tarnishing touch of time.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small, wooden table bestrewn with knots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Steel was anointed with liquid chrome, cooled, and beaten into a flat and workable surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was salvaged from moist groves, shaved into planks, and carried to the freeholds on the Shale Bridge. There it was received by carpenters who, acclimated to the wetless air, eagerly took the rich wood for their own projects.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sharp rectangle seems to have been balanced on a metal pole over a smaller rectangle, forming a steady working surface. No welding scars are visible.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's scratched on top where a pestle splintered the wood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Decorated with painted mandalas and shaped by the geometric hand, the table honors symmetry and numerology.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was precisely cut into drawers and set on brass rails to house clothes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dwellers in the earth-clefts fashion tables in the style of puzzle boxes. Their drawers house the stenographic imagination.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This metal box is equipped to deploy a bewildering array of mechanisms in butchering meat and preserving foodstuffs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Juice is transferred to battery cells through the inductive pad on this metal table so long as it is powered.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shelves, pads, slates, and cradles are worked from metal like a chrome honeycomb. Electrical power gets concentrated into battery-juice and served into its docked cells.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal was braided into electromagnetic scaffolding, and through it the modulator molds the clay of the baseband and divulges the shape of the new signal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bits of tiny matter are smashed together behind the lune of a chrome cylinder, and the heat is used to pump electricity downgrid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This metal stand has an array of power outlets as well as a set of heavy-duty conduit sockets, making it able to connect corded electrical appliances to a power grid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Copper, aluminum, and glass fiber were rounded into an electrical conduit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Copper, carbon, and glass fiber were rounded into a robust electrical conduit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal was forged into a machine artery.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic was moulded into a machine artery.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glass was blown into a machine artery.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was shaved, cut to smooth-volumed shafts, and fit inside gearboxes to convey motion in continuity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An assemblage of metal shafts and gearboxes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bits of tiny matter are smashed together behind the lune of a chrome cylinder, and the heat is used to suck water into pipes for dispersal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A square metal frame with a powerful crushing hydraulic piston in the middle.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A massive, stationary metal installation with hydraulic connectors and heavy-duty power conduits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Magnetized steel drives a diaphragm upward and life water is propelled through glass pipes to thirsty plants.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wooden construction using four fabric sails mounted on a tower to drive the motion of a central shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood paddles black with wet-rot catch the force of the babbling brook and set the wheel to the slow motion of centuries.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Circles of limestone, porous and oyster-gray with the shells of old things, are arranged in vertical slabs and turned against each other to grind fibrous grains into flours.

part.Name: Mill
part.Transformations: Vinewafer,Lagroot Tuber,Mirror Shard,Psychal Gland,Voider Gland,Clump of Grave Moss,Compacted Bone Matter

part.Short: A simple wooden chair of homely make.

tag.Name: HeroNameTitleTemplate
tag.Value: *Name* the *Descriptor*, legendary *CreatureType*;*Name*, legendary *CreatureType* and friend to *Noun*

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Planks of wood are nailed together at right angles in the style of the marsh dwellers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stuffed with watervine chaff and glowcrow feathers, this buttoned pillow lets folk repose with crossed legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Convivia in the limen, the boundary between sun-baked Moghra'yi and the shade of the Spindle, involves the mulling of cider, holography, and the arrangement of klinai at right angles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Planks of wood are nailed together simply to form the austere seat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nothing is in situ, everything is in motion, and the seated must prepare for the next moment where the memory of leisure is burned in neurotic effigy. The stool abides these truths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Jointed wood and knit watervine make a movable wharf for the ass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The ornamentation of etched metal and precious stones designate the axis mundi.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Kneaded under the salt sun by a leatherworker and stuffed with glowcrow feathers for the repose of its owner.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic white as salt bleach was contoured for ideal digestion and harmony of the humors.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's fitted with a crankshaft that turns a dimpled rubber sheet and kneads kinks out the hindparts of its sitter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tight-fitted black mesh straightens the spine. Wheels descend from casters and locomote.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic white as salt bleach was contoured to the posture for ideal rumination.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Historians of leisure divide all epochs into the following three ages: the span before ursine creatures evolve or civilizations rise to admire them, the span between ursine prominence and a civilization's capacity to fashion divans in their likeness, and thence the span until the civilization's fall.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In its new context the peptic chair menaces. Dried blood paints the plastic seat. Its catheters fray like a knot of worms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hidden micro-reactors smash together particles, generate heat, and power the biotic machine apparatus that restores life to the wounded recliner.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic smoothed on a heat lathe was kneaded into a design that evokes an Eater's intuition for how a perfect ball warps spacetime around itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wood-framed bed.

tag.Name: HeroNameTitleTemplate
tag.Value: *Name* the *Descriptor*, legendary *CreatureType*;*Name*, legendary *CreatureType* and friend to *Noun*

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fabrics were stuffed with watervine chaff and laid across wooden slats in the style of the hillfolk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood slats are megaliths to a child. Feather pillows are cold meadows. Here are the boundaries of their dusk-world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Watervine canvas is stretched and folded over wood legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brinestraw was braided into a rope lattice saddle for slinging between two old oaks and napping. The fibers on the middle-sag are extra frayed from the center-mass strain of a reclining ass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was meticulously turned into columns and ornamentally whittled. Quilted downs were bartered from the seamstresses on the banks of the River Svy, layered as a cake and frosted with pillows. Here the moneyed slumberer finds a favored ingress to the dreaming dale.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic white as salt bleach was contoured for peaceful slumber, convalescence, and realignment of the humours.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wooden slats are laid on right angles in the style of the hillfolk. In place of a chaff cushion, however, lies a plastic mattress pumped with unctuous water, an alternative favored by raft-floaters who pine for the waves of the lake.

tag.Name: HeroNameTitleNoun
tag.Value: the Weary,the Tired,the Ebb and Flow,Sailors

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Historians of leisure divide all epochs into the following three ages: the span before ursine creatures evolve or civilizations rise to admire them, the span between ursine prominence and a civilization's capacity to fashion divans in their likeness, and thence the span until the civilization's fall.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hidden micro-reactors smash together particles, generate heat, and power the biotic machine apparatus that rejuvenates the weary slumberer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rust-caked spines line the interior of an iron sarcophagus. Dissatisfied with the caliber of earthly punishments, its deviser sought to deprave even the restful slumber of eternity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tetraxenonoglass walls and convalesscent gel recreate the conditions of the amnion where reptile, bird, and mammal embryos are nurtured to whole life.

part.Name: Enclosing
part.EffectDescriptionPostfix: Rejuvenates health and regenerates lost body parts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stoneware catches the tiny bit of moisture surrendered by the bone-dry air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stone was carved and shaped into a rough dome with square, even-spaced windows to let air flow. The small difference in temperature inside the dome causes dew to condense from air and accumulate in a catch basin below.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Heat from the salt sun evaporates brackish water. When the water condenses again, it's separated into its pure and impure elements: salt gloms on the still, while freshwater collects in the basin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome flanges maximize the surface area for evaporated air to re-settle as distilled dew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crystal waterpipe with several smoking stems.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the thick clay oven, and with it comes the smell of scrumptious food.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the thick clay oven, and with it comes the smell of scrumptious food.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the thick clay oven, and with it comes the smell of hot starapple jam and toasted matz.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the round mud oven, and with it comes the smell of mulled cider and brined mushrooms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the round clay oven, and with it comes the smell of steamed goat and sweet bananas.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the round bone oven, and with it comes the smell of leavened pastry, sweet bananas, and warm skulk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the bright stone oven, and with it comes the smell of hot spine fruit jam and roasted tail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the thick clay oven, and with it comes the smell of lah broth and steamed matz.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the dark electric oven, and with it comes the smell of bitter yuckwheat and boiled plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A basket woven from marsh reed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chewed and scratched cage of wire.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood planks nailed at orthogonal angles. Dust sleeps on the paper jackets of the glyph-cloths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood planks nailed at orthogonal angles. Dust sleeps on the paper jackets of the glyph-cloths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This statue worked from *material* intricately depicts *creature.a**creature*:

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simple chest made from dried brinestalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Teeth, shell, and bones were blackened into stasis by the earthy gunk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wooden locker made from dried brinestalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The remains of a locker chewed and eaten by corrosion.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A smooth blue plastic pod marked with a red cross.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A metal locker that looks worn with age.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simple wooden desk made of dried brinestalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sleekly designed metal desk that looks worn with age.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Solid, well-packed dirt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Irregular volumes of stone are heaped together. Across its surface, points of order poke sporadically through the pile of entropy: a statue's finger, the gnomon of a sundial, a parcel of circuitboard.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scattered debris.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Solid, well-packed dirt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of thickly-thatched, woody jungle vines.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here are several stripped trunks of sallow brinestalk bonded with mud.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Burnt clay ingots are laid crosswise, and a barrier is made. Each brick is marred by the variegated cuts of time, imperfections in the heat balance of the oven it was fired in, and fungi in its birthing mud.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Time and chance -- the two hands of nature -- have woven roots, stems, and leaves into a fibrous dam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A holographic representation of a wall of crumbling shale.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of dense, flecked basalt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of tarnished metal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Snails and coral were crushed on the geologic press, painted into ribbons of impurity, and polished along the ideal plane.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rock is eroded to sand, sand is blown into lakes, lakes are buried in mud, and mud crushes sand to rock. Earth is rearranged.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Invertebrate life was sucked of its tissue and bled still over millions of years. The glaucous rock is a necropolis.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lacustrine ecosystems, cast in lime-rich mud, put their million-year-old affairs on display in chalk-white shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carmine clouds assume their crystal habit: cubes nested inside and out. Why does Moghra'yi conceal this form from the sun?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Burnt crystal gold tosses its geometric shadows onto the floors of a million watery grottos.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black stone stands in monument to the cities of snails that perished under clay and rotted into pyrite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Reefs were the arcologies of the young oceans. Now they are turquoise crypts, their surfaces bitten by acid water into rough wounds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stony eggs are incubated in pearly planar sheets. No larvae ever hatch; they're abraded into dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Unnamed to the beings of the surface world are the birthing atria of the subterrane, where ultramafic rock is wetted in amniotic fluid and birthed as a world-serpent.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Volcanic dust pupated in its deep-earth cocoon and cracked free as grey stone. Sophists theorize it's the color of pure aether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cyan bursts through a glassy hull and looks as though the sky was crystallized into a thicket of hexagonal prisms. The Eaters dug it up from its magmatic birthsite and arranged it into mounds to enshrine the Spindle.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dappled crystal mosaics of red and cyan are the metamorphic remnants of crumbling world-plates. The new earth struggles to be born.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: World-voids in the nethermost reaches of the planet are partitioned by numinous masonry. There is meaning in the patterns of its faint white filigree, but it's discerned by no one.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: World-voids in the nethermost reaches of the planet are partitioned by numinous masonry. There is meaning in the patterns of its faint white filigree, but it's discerned by no one.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of crumbling shale with agate deposits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of crumbling shale with topaz deposits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of crumbling shale with jasper deposits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of crumbling shale with amethyst deposits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of crumbling shale with sapphire deposits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of crumbling shale with emerald deposits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of meteorite with {{peridot|peridot}} deposits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small, but heavy, stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small, but heavy, stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wax, secreted by plants and cooled into a block.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wax, secreted by plants and cooled into a block.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wall of solid granite.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is an exquisitely detailed high relief cut from precious cerulean marble. It depicts the Sacred Joining, as recounted by Shekhinah the Father to the temple high priests. In the early dawn of our universe, the Argent Fathers roamed the timeless aether with inert hearts. There, in the coldest distance of space, they discovered beauty-and-chrome incarnate, the Kasaphescence. Together they wrought machines from Her naked womb to inhabit a hundred earths. In the scene here, the Fathers first approach Her Radiance. They are led by Shekhinah, who occupies a position of prominence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a high relief cut with exquisite detail from rare, cerulean marble. It depicts the Edification, as chanted in the Canticles Chromaic. After the Sacred Joining, the Argent Fathers molded the plasmatic metal of the Kasaphescence into edifices fit for inhabitance by mortal folk. They wrought spires onto mountains and arches over rivers. Here, Shekhinah oversees the construction, gazing east upon His new, gleaming world.

Through such thaumaturgy, the people of hoary Ibul, cradled in the breast of a collapsed ice shelf, wander its lamplighted streets in rosy-cheeked disinterest.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Cybernetics2BaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Neutralizes one damage source that would cause a lethal amount of damage or deal at least 50% of your max HP. This implant is destroyed in the process.

part.LethalMessage: =subject.Name's= =object.name= =objverb:burst= outward, destroying =objpronouns.reflexive= to prevent potentially lethal damage.
part.MaxHitpointsThresholdMessage: =subject.Name's= =object.name= =objverb:burst= outward, destroying =objpronouns.reflexive= to prevent catastrophic damage.

part.Name: Cybernetics2BaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Provides a continuous 5000 units of charge per turn to equipped items that can access onboard power systems, such as items with the Jacked mod.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Cybernetics2BaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Automatically discharges flame-retardant gel every turn you're on fire. This ability can be toggled on or off.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Cybernetics2BaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You cannot be forced to move by physical means. This ability can be toggled on and off.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Cybernetics2BaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Reduces the action cost of applying injectors by 80%. Can be loaded with up to 8 injectors, which the medassist module AI will automatically apply when appropriate (at its own discretion) for no action cost. The module AI can be toggled on and off.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ionic dust dissolved from palladium facilitates the transfer of computing current.

part.Name: Cybernetics2BaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: Provides 20 units of compute power on the local lattice. +2 Intelligence if implanted in a head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Beneath the glass arch of this enclosure there is a standing rectangle of neutrofoam with the imprint of a human form. Across the foam at eye level, glyphs dance on a diaphonous screen. Surgical machinery, obscured by blinding light, reposes above.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome pegs form a lattice where modules await coupling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Erosion has smoothed its features into abstraction, but once it stood in monument to the coupling of machine and folk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Features erupt from a stone canvas and shatter into a figure from the deep past. Hair, skin, brow, thigh: the details hatch a new emotion inside you, the sense of the strange-familiar. As you move about the petrified likeness, you wonder at how this Eater managed to incise themself into your spacetime braid.
